DOC.brief_summary: This trial design compare meal relate inhalation Technosphere/Insulin subcutaneous regular insulin patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: To Compare Effect Inhaled Insulin With Subcutaneously Injected Insulin Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus .
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis type 2 diabetes mellitus . Current regimen intensify insulin therapy least 6 month . Body Mass Index less 35 kg/m2 . HbA1c le equal 9 % . Nonsmoker least 2 year . If medication addition insulin take screening , patient must stable regimen define continue use dose medication period least three month . Forced vital capacity ( FVC ) , forced expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) , force midexpiratory flow rate 25 % 75 % ( FEF2575 ) , slow vital capacity ( SVC ) measure spirometry , singlebreath carbon monoxide diffuse capacity correct hemoglobin carboxyhemoglobin ( DLco ) , great equal 80 % expect normal . Ability perform PFT , without cough within first 5 second test . Written informed consent . Diabetes mellitus type 1 . Current treatment ( within last 30 day ) oral antidiabetic agent . Regular preprandial dos regular insulin 30 IU . Intake drug herbal preparation , evaluation investigator , may interfere interpretation trial result know cause clinically relevant interference insulin action , glucose utilization recovery hypoglycemia ( e.g . systemic steroid ) . History hypersensitivity study drug drug similar chemical structure . Treatment investigational drug within three month prior enrollment study . Progressive fatal disease . History malignancy within five year study entry ( basal cell epithelioma ) . History drug alcohol abuse . Evidence severe secondary complication diabetes ( neuropathy , nephropathy evidence creatinine > 1.5 female > 1.8 male , retinopathy , severe peripheral vascular disease ) . Evidence gastroparesis , orthostatic hypotension hypoglycemia unawareness ( autonomic neuropathy ) . Myocardial infarction stroke within precede six month . Positive hepatitis B ( hepatitis B surface antigen ) and/or hepatitis C ( hepatitis C antibody ) serology and/or positive HIV serology . History presence clinically significant cardiovascular , hepatic ( evidenced ALT AST > 3 time normal reference range ) , gastrointestinal , neurological infectious disorder capable alter absorption , metabolism elimination drug , constitute risk factor take study medication . Anemia ( hemoglobin level less 11 g/dL female 12 g/dL male ) . Ongoing respiratory tract infection . Pregnancy , lactation , intention become pregnant . Sexually active woman childbearing potential practicing inadequate birth control ( adequate birth control define use oral contraceptive , condom diaphragms spermacide , intrauterine device , surgical sterilization ) . Regular alcohol intake great 14 units*/week , subject unwilling stop alcohol duration study ( * 1 unit = 8 g ethanol , 1/4 liter beer 1 glass wine 1 measure spirit ) . Investigator site personnel directly affiliate study , immediate family . Immediate family define spouse , parent , child sibling , whether biological legally adopt . A lack compliance ( include inability maintain minimum 75 % compliance study drug administration ) reason , opinion Investigator preclude participation subject study . Prior diagnosis idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis , asbestosis , silicosis , sarcoidosis , histiocytosis X ( Langerhans cell histiocytosis ) , farmer 's lung , Wegener 's granulomatosis , pneumoconiosis ( coal miner 's lung ) , desquamative interstitial pneumonia , alveolar proteinosis , Goodpasture 's syndrome , bronchiolitis obliterans organize pneumonia ( BOOP ) , hypersensitivity pneumonitis , lymphangioleiomyomatosis , amyloidosis , lymphocytic interstitial pneumonitis , ChurgStrauss syndrome ( allergic granulomatosis angiitis ) . Current chronic infection tuberculosis , cytomegalovirus , aspergillus , blastomyces , cryptococcus , histoplasma , coccidioides , pneumocystis carinii , mycobacterium avium intracellulare , pseudomonas , actinomyces , nodcardia , mucor , candida . Prior diagnosis systemic autoimmune collagen vascular disease require previous current treatment systemic corticosteroid , cytotoxic drug , penicillamine . History chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , reactive airway disease , bronchiectasis , bronchiolitis obliterans , chronic bronchitis , emphysema asthma require hospitalization and/or chronic treatment supplemental oxygen inhale systemic beta adrenoreceptor agonist , steroid corticosteroid .
